description:
Heartfelt thanks to the DEF CON community for your support in 2025. Here's hoping your 2026 exceeds your dreams.

We've got big plans for the New Year. In addition to DC34 in Las Vegas we're returning to Bahrain and adding DEF CON Singapore. New CTF runners. More trainings. We're excited and we hope you are, too.

Keep in touch with us for updates and deadlines. Look out for each other. See you soon.
title: Happy New Year!
